# Latest News

[](https://youtu.be/3Rgtq2exGRI?si=ezaJpgoCzInsFBOJ)

Visit Federal Way created a beautiful short film showcasing our collection. Watch: [_**Find Your Way: Hidden Sanctuary**_](https://youtu.be/3Rgtq2exGRI?si=ezaJpgoCzInsFBOJ).

_****_

[](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/free-digital-guide/)

#### [ENHANCE YOUR VISIT](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/free-digital-guide/)

Our free digital guide is available through the Bloomberg Connects app. Explore our bonsai collection in depth, access exclusive content, and personalize your museum experience. [Get started](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/free-digital-guide/).

#### Volunteer with us

Do you have a few spare hours for a worthy cause? We welcome volunteer docents, event helpers, bonsai caregivers, and groundskeepers. [Learn more and sign up…](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/support/volunteer/)

[](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/tours/)

#### [ In-Person and Virtual Group Tours available](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/tours/)

[Learn more and reserve a time…](https://pacificbonsaimuseum.org/visit/tours/)
